p: However, different EO will have different modes of action on viruses; in general, they act by targeting the nucleic acid polymerases. Generally, it has been shown that thymol and phenylpropanoids are compounds that have been responsible for the antiviral activity in HSV and JEV. EOsâ€™ antiviral properties can be a promising alternative in the future, as more human trials must be conducted in order to provide more supportive evidence in terms of efficacy and safety.
